thread.title: Knicks' Carmelo Anthony named to replace Cavaliers' Kevin Love at All-Star Game
thread.title_full: Knicks' Carmelo Anthony named to replace Cavaliers' Kevin Love at All-Star Game

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Knicks' Carmelo Anthony named to replace Cavaliers' Kevin Love at All-Star Game
text:
Knicks' Anthony named to replace Cavaliers' Love at All-Star Game Knicks forward will step in for Cavaliers' injured forward and make his 10th All-Star appearance. Post to Facebook Knicks' Anthony named to replace Cavaliers' Love at All-Star Game Knicks forward will step in for Cavaliers' injured forward and make his 10th All-Star appearance.  //usat.ly/2lRfx5i   Knicks' Anthony named to replace Cavaliers' Love at All-Star Game USA TODAY Sports 9:54 p.m. ET Feb. 15, 2017 Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony, left, will replace Cavaliers forward Kevin Love, right, at this weekend's All-Star Game. (Photo: Rick Osentoski, USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
NBA Commissioner Adam Silver announced New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony will replace injured Cleveland Cavaliers forward Kevin Love at the NBA All-Star Game on Sunday in New Orleans. 
This marks the 10th All-Star selection for Anthony, who went into Wednesday's game against the Oklahoma City Thunder averaging 23.2 points, 6.1 rebounds and 2.9 assists. This is the eighth consecutive year that Anthony will play in the All-Star Game. 
Love had arthroscopic surgery on his left knee Tuesday and is expected to miss six weeks. NEVER MISS OUT Sports Stay in the know and in the zone, 7 days a week, with scores, analysis, and in-depth features and commentary. THANKS FOR SIGNING UP FOR THE Sports NEWSLETTER 
We're sorry.
